title: Greta Van Susteren Christmas Special Coming on Newsmax
snippet: She will be spotlighting the ministry of Operation Christmas Child as we delivered shoebox gifts to children in need. Her Christmas TV special will be airing at 4 p.m. on Newsmax on Christmas Day.

title: Greta Van Susteren - News - IMDb
snippet: Newsmax reported higher revenue during the second quarter of 2025, though expenses related to the settlement of a defamation lawsuit with Dominion Voting Systems pushed the company deeper into the red.
